name: Sleepscape
description:
You are running a Sleep Rehab Centre. As the game plays out, it is your job to help the NPC’s cure their inability to sleep by helping them battle with their subconscious mind. 

It is within the minds of these NPC’s that we find the main gameplay of Sleepscape. While sleeping, the NPC will go through the 5 stages of sleep, with each stage involving a different player controlled mini game. Once these 5 stages/minigames have been completed, the NPC will be cured from his inability to sleep.  

As well as minigames, the game will feature various environments to explore, with each containing several interactable objects that give more backstory to the hotel and the world.  

This project was created to an Assessment Brief given to us by AIE. Our team worked hard and we hope you will enjoy our efforts :)
